melody_GT.lyrics: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

system_a.lyrics: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

system_b.lyrics: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper some wisdom, let it be.

melody_GT.lyrics: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better.

system_a.lyrics: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better.

system_b.lyrics: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad tune and make it better.
